W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREA_IN_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_BOFO_AREA_IN_DETAIL.text: You found a world teeming with vegetation and water on the other side of the door. Will you really find a triangle here?

W11_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_330_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_330_DETAIL.text: The green line is directing you to two clerics of the Imeru. Will they guide you to another triangle?

W11_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_999_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_999_DETAIL.text: You can leave Kamala through here.

W11_GIMK_BOFO_TRIANGLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_GIMK_BOFO_TRIANGLE_100_DETAIL.text: You are being guided to an egg containing a fiend of Ancikar. What is the connection between the triangles and Ancikar?
